name: International Ceramics and Composite Materials Conference
content: OLCCCM-2019 will provide a wonderful forum for you to refresh your knowledge base and explore the innovations in Ceramics and Composite Materials conferences will be hosting International Ceramics and Composite Materials this year. This exciting event is scheduled on December 09-10, 2019 London, UK, strives to bring many Prominent Speakers, Renowned Scientists, Professors, Medical and Industrial Professionals, Young Researchers, Student Delegates and Business Delegates, along with information-packed Workshops, will fill the agenda.
